abstract: Bert takes perverse pleasure in his total lack of personal hygiene
description: The state of Bert's bathroom reflects his personal hygiene, both are totally disgusting. Bert wallows in his squalid ways until one morning the bathroom strikes back, startling him into unlikely action. Beware - Gross out humour a-plenty here
